item.title: Fortnite story
item.description: Fortnite was a game released at the end of July 2017, its original name was Fortnite: Save the World with payment for early access with plans to be free-to-play what would be Fortnite: Battle Royale. Its first announcement was in 2012 . Fortnite: Save the World One day, 98% of Earth’s human population suddenly disappeared, and the remaining humans found the skies covered with dense clouds, creating chaotic storms that dropped husks: zombie-like humanoid creatures that attacked the living.
